snippet: A merger of Glencore International, the world’s largest commodities trader, and the mining company Xstrata would value the combined company at $90 billion.
abstract: A merger of Glencore International, the world’s largest commodities trader, and the mining company Xstrata would value the combined company at $90 billion.

headline.main: Glencore Says Higher Bid for Xstrata Is Its Final Offer
headline.print_headline: Glencore Revises Merger Offer to Xstrata
